data.-list=true: List files whose formatting differs (always false if using STDIN)
data.-write=true: Write result to source file instead of STDOUT (always false if using STDIN or -check)
data.-check=false: Check if the input is formatted. Exit status will be 0 if all input is properly formatted and non-zero otherwise.

Description:
Rewrites all Terraform configuration files to a canonical format.
	If DIR is not specified then the current working directory will be used.
	If DIR is "-" then content will be read from STDIN.
